name: TheLeveretBow
description:
The Leveret Bow is a 3D platformer/stealth game in which you play has rabbit, that found a very powerful bow.

Key Features:

•Bow and Arrow combat

•Special arrows to easy traversal

•Sneak or confront you enemy’s up close or from a far

•Steal valuable loot to increase your legend

Social Media

In case you want more indepth information about TheLeveretBow  feel free to follow our socials:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BowLeveret IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/the-leveret-bow

Install Instructions

Open Zip File.

Extract to desired location.

Open "TheLeveretBow - Build" Folder.

Open "WindowsNoEditor" Folder.

Double Click  the Executable.

Enjoy
